MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the ST7 postcode area of Church Lawton, affecting properties in Brown Avenue and surrounding streets. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.28PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.35PM on 15th April 2021.
